name: Candyland Casino
description: There will be trivia, spin the bottle - truth or trivia, bingo, hat game, and normal gambling with slots, cards, and roulette!

name: Games Night
description: Come to The Three Broomsticks to play Trivia Race and, back by popular demand, Bingo! The winners will get $1 million each!

name: Y2K NIGHT
description: A night of throwback fun and big wins!
